relationships.description: A relationships object for a field_mapping_result

attributes.description: An attributes object for a invitation

custom_message.description: Optional personal message from the inviter. Field included by default.

permissions.description: Permissions to grant on acceptance. Field included by default.

tenant_id.description: Denormalized tenant_id for multi-tenant filtering. Field included by default.

relationships.description: A relationships object for a invitation

data.description: An identifier for inviter

attributes.description: An attributes object for a system_message

content.description: Markdown content. Field included by default.

requires_acceptance.description: For ToS: forces users to re-accept even if they accepted a previous version. Field included by default.

relationships.description: A relationships object for a system_message

attributes.description: An attributes object for a wholesale-agreement

hold_days.description: Days to hold funds before release. Field included by default.

minimum_payout_cents.description: Minimum payout amount in cents ($25.00 default). Field included by default.

minimum_retail_floors.description:
Per-service minimum retail floors that ISV must charge their tenants.
Format: [%{"service_id" => "doc_extraction_base", "minimum" => %Money{}}]
Platform admin sets these to ensure ISVs don't undercut below certain prices.
. Field included by default.

model.description: Wholesale pricing model: percentage of retail or fixed floor rates. Field included by default.

rates.description: Per-operation floor rates for interchange-plus model. Field included by default.

take_rate_percent.description: Platform take rate as percentage of retail (for percentage model). Field included by default.

relationships.description: A relationships object for a wholesale-agreement

data.description: An identifier for isv_tenant

attributes.description: An attributes object for a agent_usage

relationships.description: A relationships object for a agent_usage

attributes.description: An attributes object for a extraction_document

classification_confidence.description: Overall classification confidence (0.0 to 1.0). Field included by default.

stage.description: Current processing stage based on storage path. Field included by default.

deduplicated.description: Whether this document was returned as a duplicate via find_or_begin_upload. Field included by default.

schema_revision.description: Schema revision number used for extraction. Field included by default.

billed_credits.description: Credits billed for processing this document. Field included by default.

line_count.description: Line count of extracted text. Field included by default.

image_height.description: Image height in pixels (for image documents). Field included by default.

file_hash.description: SHA256 hash of the file content for deduplication

char_count.description: Character count of extracted text. Field included by default.

bucket_name.description: The S3 bucket where this document is stored. Set during upload/begin_upload.

classification.description: Classification object containing domain, document_type, municipality, state, and confidence

municipality.description: Municipality/agency name extracted from document content. Field included by default.

queue_reason.description: Reason why this document is in the review queue

moved_at.description: Timestamp when document was moved to output/error bucket

output_storage_path.description: Full path (bucket/key) where document was copied after successful extraction

training_metadata.description: Metadata about the training session for this document (trained_at, user_id, scores)

image_width.description: Image width in pixels (for image documents). Field included by default.

verification_status.description: The review/verification state of the document. Field included by default.

completed_at.description: Timestamp when document processing completed (status changed to :completed). Field included by default.

schema_version.description: The version of the agent/schema used to process this document. Field included by default.

state.description: State or province code (2-letter). Field included by default.

error_storage_path.description: Full path (bucket/key) where document was copied after failed extraction

domain.description: Document domain from specialty agent (legal, financial, medical, etc.). Field included by default.

excluded_from_training.description: If true, this document is excluded from training (both creating new examples and being used in retrieval)

word_count.description: Word count of extracted text. Field included by default.

avg_confidence.description: Average confidence score across all extracted fields (0.0 to 1.0). Field included by default.

document_type.description: Specific document type from specialty agent (Traffic Citation, Invoice, etc.). Field included by default.

relationships.description: A relationships object for a extraction_document
